snippet: UEFA, European soccer’s governing body, decided to wipe out players’ bookings after the quarterfinals of club competitions.
abstract: UEFA, European soccer’s governing body, rules that players will no longer be suspended for Champion League and Europe League finals for accumulating yellow cards; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: UEFA, European soccer’s governing body, decided to wipe out players’ bookings after the quarterfinals of club competitions.

headline.main: Suspension Rules Eased for Champions League
